languages.text: {n}Губернатор понижает голос.{/n} "Известно. Господин ван Калокс отбыл в Благословенную Электродинамическую обитель. Это — древний монастырь {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Цели его мне неизвестны. В окрестностях обители было замечено передвижение мятежников, конечно. Но, полагаю, это слишком мелкая проблема для агента святейшей Инквизиции. К тому же я уже выслал небольшое подкрепление в этот регион".

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор понижает голос.{/n} "Известно. Господин ван Калокс отбыл в Благословенную Электродинамическую обитель. Это — древний монастырь {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Цели его мне неизвестны. В окрестностях обителя было замечено передвижение мятежников, конечно. Но, полагаю, это слишком мелкая проблема для агента святейшей Инквизиции. К тому же, я уже выслал небольшое подкрепление в этот регион".

languages.text: {n}The governor lowers his voice.{/n} "I do. Master van Calox has left for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It's an ancient monastery of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I don't know what his objectives are. Needless to say, insurgent activity has been observed in the monastery's vicinity. But I suppose that's too petty of a problem for an agent of the Most Holy Inquisition. Besides, I have already sent a small detachment of reinforcements there."

Но, полагаю, это слишком мелкая проблема для агента святейшей Инквизиции. К тому же я уже выслал небольшое подкрепление в этот регион".

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Ja. Meister van Calox ist zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium aufgebrochen. Das ist ein uraltes Kloster des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Ich weiß nicht, welche Ziele er verfolgt. Natürlich wurden auch in der Nähe des Klosters Aufständische gesichtet. Aber das ist für einen Agenten der Heiligsten Inquisition wohl ein zu triviales Problem. Zudem habe ich schon einen kleinen Trupp als Verstärkung hingeschickt."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor lowers his voice.{/n} "I do. Master van Calox has left for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It's an ancient monastery of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I don't know what his objectives are. Needless to say, insurgent activity has been observed in the monastery's vicinity. But I suppose that's too petty of a problem for an agent of the Most Holy Inquisition. Besides, I have already sent a small detachment of reinforcements there."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Ja. Lord van Calox ist zum Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium aufgebrochen. Das ist ein uraltes Kloster des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Ich weiß nicht, welche Ziele er verfolgt. Natürlich wurden auch in der Nähe des Klosters Aufständische gesichtet. Aber das ist für einen Agenten der Heiligsten Inquisition wohl ein zu triviales Problem. Zudem habe ich bereits einen kleinen Verstärkungstrupp in die Region geschickt."

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur répond en baissant le ton :{/n} « Oui. Maître van Calox s'est rendu au Cenobium électrodynamique sacré. C'est un ancien monastère de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. J'ignore quels sont ses objectifs. Inutile de vous dire que les insurgés font des leurs à proximité du monastère. Mais j'imagine que c'est un problème trop insignifiant pour un agent de la Sainte Inquisition. Et puis, j'ai déjà envoyé là-bas un petit contingent de renforts. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor lowers his voice.{/n} "I do. Master van Calox has left for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It's an ancient monastery of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I don't know what his objectives are. Needless to say, insurgent activity has been observed in the monastery's vicinity. But I suppose that's too petty of a problem for an agent of the Most Holy Inquisition. Besides, I have already sent a small detachment of reinforcements there."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur répond en baissant le ton :{/n} « Oui. Maître van Calox s'est rendu au Cenobium électrodynamique sacré. C'est un ancien monastère de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. J'ignore quels sont ses objectifs. Inutile de vous dire que les insurgés font des leurs à proximité du monastère. Mais j'imagine que c'est un problème trop insignifiant pour un agent de la Sainte Inquisition. Et puis, j'ai déjà envoyé là-bas un petit contingent de renforts. »

languages.text: {n}总督压低了声音。{/n}“我知道，冯·卡洛克斯大师去了神圣电驱修会。那里是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的古老修道院，我不知道他去那里是出于什么原因。我们在修道院附近观察到了叛军的活动痕迹，这并不让人意外。但我认为，对至圣审判庭的代理人而言，这样的小问题其实不值得这么大费周章。除此之外，我已经派了一支小小的增援部队前往那片地区。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor lowers his voice.{/n} "I do. Master van Calox has left for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It's an ancient monastery of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I don't know what his objectives are. Needless to say, insurgent activity has been observed in the monastery's vicinity. But I suppose that's too petty of a problem for an agent of the Most Holy Inquisition. Besides, I have already sent a small detachment of reinforcements there."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督压低了声音。{/n}“我知道，冯·卡洛克斯大人去了神圣电驱力修会。那里是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的古老修道院，我不知道他去那里是出于什么原因，不过我们在修道院附近观察到了叛军的活动痕迹。但我认为，对于至圣审判庭的代理人而言，这样的小问题其实不值得这么大费周章。除此之外，我还派了一部分增援部队前往那片地区。”

languages.text: {n}総督は声を落とした。{/n}「あぁ、ヴァン・カロックス殿は神聖なる電力連生体へ出発された。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の古い修道院だ。目的は分からない。言うまでもないが、修道院周辺で反乱者の動きが観察されている。だが、そんなことは最も神聖な異端審問庁には些細な問題のはず。それに、私は既に少人数の増援部隊を派遣している」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor lowers his voice.{/n} "I do. Master van Calox has left for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It's an ancient monastery of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I don't know what his objectives are. Needless to say, insurgent activity has been observed in the monastery's vicinity. But I suppose that's too petty of a problem for an agent of the Most Holy Inquisition. Besides, I have already sent a small detachment of reinforcements there."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は声を落とした。{/n}「あぁ、ヴァン・カロックス殿は神聖なる電力連生体へ出発された。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の古い修道院だ。目的は分からない。修道院周辺で反乱者の動きが見られることはハッキリしている。だが、そんなことは最も神聖な異端審問庁には些細な問題のはず。それに、私は既にこの地域に少人数の増援部隊を送っている」

languages.text: {n}El gobernador baja la voz.{/n}«Así es. El maestro van Calox ha partido hacia el Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado. Es un antiguo monasterio del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. No sé cuáles son sus objetivos, pero sin duda tienen que ver con los movimientos de insurgentes en las inmediaciones del monasterio. Aunque eso es un problema demasiado insignificante para un agente de la Santísima Inquisición. Además, ya he enviado un destacamento de refuerzos a la región».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor lowers his voice.{/n} "I do. Master van Calox has left for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It's an ancient monastery of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I don't know what his objectives are. Needless to say, insurgent activity has been observed in the monastery's vicinity. But I suppose that's too petty of a problem for an agent of the Most Holy Inquisition. Besides, I have already sent a small detachment of reinforcements there."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador baja la voz.{/n}«Así es. Lord van Calox ha partido hacia el Cenobio Electrodinámico Sagrado. Es un antiguo monasterio del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. No sé cuáles son sus objetivos. Obviamente, se han observado movimientos de insurgentes en las inmediaciones del monasterio. Pero supongo que eso es un problema demasiado insignificante para un agente de la Santísima Inquisición. Además, ya he enviado pequeños refuerzos a la región».

languages.text: {n}Vali, sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Malumatım var. Üstat van Calox, Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'na doğru yola çıkmıştı. Kadim bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} manastırıdır. Gayesinden haberdar değilim. Tabii ki manastır civarında da asi faaliyeti gözlemlendi lakin bunun, Pek Kutsal Engizisyon'un vekili için büyük sorun teşkil edeceğini sanmıyorum. Ayrıca oraya hâlihazırda küçük bir takviye müfrezesi göndermiştim."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor lowers his voice.{/n} "I do. Master van Calox has left for the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium. It's an ancient monastery of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I don't know what his objectives are. Needless to say, insurgent activity has been observed in the monastery's vicinity. But I suppose that's too petty of a problem for an agent of the Most Holy Inquisition. Besides, I have already sent a small detachment of reinforcements there."
